text: (O muham'mad!) Kapata visvasula gurinci niku teliyada? Varu grantha prajalalo satyatiraskarulaina tama sodarulato, ila antaru: "Okavela miru vellagotta badinatlayite, memu kuda tappaka mitobatu veltamu. Mariyu mi visayanlo memu evvari mata vinamu. Okavela mito yud'dham jarigite, memu tappaka miku sahayapadatamu." Mariyu niscayanga, varu asatyavadulu, allah ye diniki saksi
